AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.large white Ford pickup truck: vehicle driven by Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot, stopped by United States/Mexican Border Patrol due to suspicious behavior and proximity to the United States/Mexican Border, deviating from typical traffic patterns on Texas Highway 385 early on a Sunday morning, with an indirect travel route from Big Bend National Park to Alpine, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States/Mexican Border Patrol vehi: vehicles used by United States/Mexican Border Patrol agents to follow and stop suspicious vehicles, potentially triggering suspicion when encountered
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Big Bend National Park: location where the large white Ford pickup truck was seen leaving early on a Sunday morning, deviating from typical traffic patterns, with thousands of visitors using Texas Highway 385
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. District Court: court that considered an indirect route as a factor supporting reasonable suspicion
